text: Monagas Sport Club is a club of football from Maturín, Venezuela. == Presidents == * Rubén León (1988–1992) * Rumualdo Romero (1993–1995) * Jesús Salgado (1995–1996) * Rafael Castellín Osuna (1997) * Claudio González (2000–2001) * Roicis Pérez (2001–2003) * Antonio del Moral * Antonio Núñez * Manuel Villalba * Ramón Caballero (–2006) * Nelson Núñez (2006–) == Coaches == * Joaquín (Fariñas) Da Silva * Víctor Pignanelli * Luis Fernández * Antonio Mejías * Radamel García * Manolo Contreras * Eduardo Borrero * Luis Mendoza * Daniel Lanata * Alí Cañas * Franco Fasciana * Del Valle Rojas * Bernardo Redín == Famous players == * Alexander Bottini * José (Cuervito) Rivas * Rafael Castellín * José Fasciana * Franco Fasciana * César González * José (el Papi) Rivas * Carlos (Pomada) Bravo == Current roster 2007 == Goalkeepers * José Bottini * Andrés Rivas Defenders * Juan Carlos Guazá * Lenín Díaz * Andrés Mosquera * Pedro Agustín Duval * Frank José Presilla * Luis Salazar * Benzon Rovira * Robert Alexander Varrone * Ever Avendaño Midfielders * Edward Leonett * Williams Lacle * John Mancilla * Jarvy Mejía * Timshel Tábarez * Néstor Sánchez * Laynecker Zafra * Ricardo Wisniewski Forwards * Alexis Acuña * Luis Alberto Moreno * Hermes Orejuela * Jamerson Rentería == Source == liderendeportes.com == Other websites == * Official page Category:Venezuelan football clubs Category:Monagas
title: Monagas S.C.
